H0.text: Which word can go before Hammer, Knife and Boot to make three other words. Ball

H1.text: Which word can go before Hammer, Knife and Boot to make three other words. Toe

H2.text: Which word can go before Hammer, Knife and Boot to make three other words. Claw

H3.text: Which word can go before Hammer, Knife and Boot to make three other words. Jack
